text: Sad to report the passing of Tim Barnett (h/t @mdettinger).    In 2009, Tim wrote a paper about when Lake Mead would run dry.  His conclusion: about now.  It seemed alarmist at the time, but what we're finding out is that the reality of climate change *is* alarming.
